awards.text: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: Rachel is a 35 year old school teacher who has no man in her life and lives with her mother. When a man from the big city returns and asks her out, she begins to have to make decisions about her life and where she wants it to go.

title: Rachel, Rachel
